instruction: Train a GPT 3 language model to generate a realistic fake review for a given product.
output: I recently bought the IKEA side table for my living room and I am so pleased with it! The table looks great and fits perfectly into the corner. It's sturdy and easy to assemble. I've had it for a few weeks now and it's still in excellent condition. I would highly recommend this side table to anyone looking for a good quality piece of furniture at an affordable price. Great purchase!
